original_title: How I Seduce & Fuck Girls! On a Cruise Ship
overview: Toni Ribas is back with the second installment of his great series “How I Seduce and Fuck Girls”, revealing the tricks and methods he uses to get girls into bed. For this movie he is at sea on a cruise ship in the Adriatic Sea. See how he charms his way into the knickers of waitresses, other guests, receptionists and maids. Watch and learn from the master!
title: How I Seduce & Fuck Girls! On a Cruise Ship
